description: Taking ownership of platforms and products, from founding companies to leading critical integration modules.
Team bounding and mentoring, facilitating growth from junior to senior roles.
Committed to long-term success of projects and teams.
Maintains constructive outlook even during team reductions or challenging deadlines.
Innovative solutions like remote interviewing via IP Cams or dynamic graph visualization.
Founder experience, handling marketing, sales, and community management.
Demonstrated leadership overseeing cross-functional teams and freelancers.
Managed communities for Gaita.com.br and Harley Davidson social network.
